Blockchain rewards and loyalty platform

Shoppers are rewarded for purchases with cryptocurrency instead of loyalty points.

Buying becomes mining

Customers are rewarded for their and their friends' purchases with BitRewards tokens, which are credited directly to their crypto-wallets.

..and it is super easy to redeem BRW tokens

Customers can redeem BRW tokens with all platform merchants or exchange BRW into other currency on a Crypto Exchange or via Liquidity Smart Contract.

How it works.

BitRewards solutions allows shoppers to receive rewards and rebates in the form of BitRewards tokens (BRW), for their purchases and for purchases of their friends.

  • 1

    Customers make purchases

    With any merchants who is a member of Bitrewards.Network
  • 2

    Merchants give to the customers rewards denominated in BitRewards tokens

    (as a percentage of purchases, replacing traditional loyalty points)
    The merchants buy BitRewards tokens through Bitrewards.Network or at the Crypto Exchange. This drives the demand for BRW tokens up.
  • 3

    Customers hold BRW tokens or redeem with any BitRewards.Network merchants

    They don’t spend their BRW tokens immediately as they expect the exchange rate to grow. This drives the supply of BRW tokens down.

BRW token's price is set for organic growth.

The issuance is limited to 2 billion tokens, and
with the demand going up and limited supply, BRW exchange rate has fundamental
reasons to appreciate * .

* Disclaimer: The information contained herein does not constitute investment advice, the solicitation of any offer to buy any interests or make any investments, or any claims as to the performance of BRW tokens or Bitrewards.Network project.

Value for merchants.

Merchants get cutting-edge rewards and loyalty solutions for free (we now sell them for $100-$1500 per month).

It’s a great new way to reward current and attract new customers!

Just imagine how you would love a store that gives immediate rebates in cryptocurrency!

Value for customers.

A simple act of shopping enables tapping into the cryptocurrency world effortlessly and get liquid currency instead of points.

Just imagine millions of shoppers who receive cryptocurrency that they can redeem with any merchant at BitRewards platform!

What matters to our team.

We are driven to offer cutting edge digital loyalty products to small and medium merchants for free.

We create a movement for new value in customers’ loyalty, and will share with the community our expertise and open our tested solutions for the retailers in order to achieve the global adoption of the platform.

Benefits for token holders.

Low​ ​risk

Low risk due to the proven solution — BitRewards is based on the existing rewards and loyalty system from an innovative market leader with a proven success record in hundreds of online stores.

Learn more about the full list of the proven tools to Attract, Convert and Upsell

​Huge​ ​market

The market for loyalty programs is growing and will reach $4 billion by 2020 ( "Loyalty Management Market” report by MarketsAndMarkets ), with more than $50 billion loyalty points issued globally each year.

  • Loyalty market 2017

    $3B

  • CAGR

    >

    20%

  • Over​ ​

    80%​ ​

    of the customers

    participate in loyalty

    programs

Powerful API

The BitRewards solution is compatible with most existing e-commerce platforms. It is easy to implement and has a simple API.

For any device. On any platform.

  • WordPress
  • Magento
  • Joomla
  • OpenCart
  • Shopify
  • Nethouse
  • Unisender
  • Mailchimp
  • Google
    Analics
  • 1C-Bitrix
  • InSales

Cutting Edge Blockchain Technology

  • Lightning Network and Raiden Network

    super technologies designed to bring the speed and efficiency of blockchain transactions to the new level and reduce the cost to almost zero. We will use them as soon as their production versions are deployed and tested.

  • Bancor Liquidity Contract

    a solution that will provide the immediate liquidity of BitRewards tokens, which will always be exchangeable into ETH with the best possible spread.

Team leadership.

  • Alexander Egorov

    CEO

    Ilya is a charismatic Sales team leader with broad international experience in both software and hardware niches who develops relationships with partners and key accounts (Leroy Merlin, Kenwood, GoPro, Ikea, Hoff and more than 300 SMB clients). Having acquired acute understanding how to shape value proposition and make money for customers during over 12 years in sales, Ilya invents winning scenarios and trains sales team members to increase the efficiency of the product implementation processes and customer success. Highly skilled with CRM systems and showing excellent competence in human resource management and team-building, Ilya drives the team to accomplish the most ambitious business goals.

Project roadmap.

Stage 1

january - February, 2017

Development of points based loyalty system GIFTD designed to reward shoppers.

Stage 2

February - December, 2017

Structuring the concept of using Ethereum blockchain with loyalty and rewards tools and customer development of the crypto-rewards for e-commerce industry, team hiring.

Stage 3

January - May, 2018

A fully-functioning rewards and loyalty system for online merchants allowing to give BRW tokens as rewards and users’ dashboard with cryptowallet.

Stage 4

November - February, 2018

Merchant’s cryptowallet and Liquidity Smart Contract.

Stage 5

June - July, 2018

Integration of Bitrewards.Network with Lightning Network and Raiden Network.
